title: MIT-Pillar AI Collective announces first seed grant recipients
summary: The MIT-Pillar AI Collective has announced its first six grant recipients, who will receive funding and support for research projects in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data science. The grants aim to help students explore commercial applications for their research and drive commercialization through the creation of startups. The recipients will also receive mentorship, guidance, and access to resources to move quickly in the fast-paced AI environment. The projects cover a range of topics, including predictive query interfaces, design of light-activated drugs, low-cost 3D perception, sleep therapeutics, autonomous manufacturing assembly, and generative AI for video conferencing.
